title: Feature: Support onetime password
author: rokx
body_snippet:
First of all -> mRemoteNG  <- is supper cool! I love it.

I have an issue while accessing server via RDP that require two factor authentication (One-Time password). Would it be possible to add/fix support One-Time Passwords.

Currently the version 1.76.20.24669 displays a "broken" input form and I cannot find a way to proceed:

![2019-06-11 09_59_11-mRemoteNG](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3796960/59254141-ed0e4e00-8c2f-11e9-9746-9dde8b00f646.png)

This is the screen from win...

iterations.description: Valid security enhancement to support TOTP/OTP authentication (e.g. TOTP codes for SSH/RDP jump hosts) that would improve 2FA workflows in connection management.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Valid security enhancement to support TOTP/OTP authentication (e.g. TOTP codes for SSH/RDP jump hosts) that would improve 2FA workflows in connection management.
Approach: Add optional OTP/TOTP field to ConnectionInfo, integrate a TOTP library (e.g. Otp.NET) to generate codes on demand, and expose a UI button or token macro (e.g. %OTP%) for use in external tools and connection pre-scripts
